column1: * Printed in plain PLA or eSun PLA+, 0.2mm layers, 2 perimeters, 4 top/bottom layers, 20% grid infill, no support or brim

column3: CNC controller with 3 x NEMA17 400 step/rev motors, Z Touch, max & min limit inputs, one spare output
USB Microscopes, self-illuminating, 30mm dia. One of 10Mpixel resolution.
220mm of 16mm dia stout metal tubing to mount microscopes
SMT UV LED, wide angle, with resistor to run off CNC output
M8 16x1.5mm washers or similar magnetic objects
28ga 316 or 304 stainless steel wire (can use nichrome)
Wiring and connectors to suit CNC controller
